Reviews.Title: Mixed reaction to this - overall good
Reviews.Author: Hiten Patel
Reviews.Content: So the items that mattered to me were fine - prompt deliver, main items were as expected. Main items for me were the camera, memory, batteries, filters and charger. No problem. The rest of the items were very poor in quality. The tripods were very low cost and quality. The camera bag was next to useless - one big center cavity with one seperator and no side pockets at all. I have no regrets buying this as I have a tripod and bag. Price was good.

Reviews.Title: I was very pleased with the prompt delivery.
Reviews.Author: Imtiaz A.
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera. Met expectation.Will recommend to my friend.This camera is light and easy to handle and all the features one needs.

ProductInfo.Features:
Pocket camera with professional-grade performance
24.3 MP for superb detail and amazing enlargements
World's first OLED electronic viewfinder; 2359K dots
Up to 10 fps shooting to capture the decisive moment
APS-C CMOS sensor for DSLR-class imaging
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Alpha NEX-7 Interchangeable Lens Digital Camera w/18-55mm Lens (Black) + 32GB SDHC Memory + 2 Extended Life Batteries + 3 Piece Filter Kit + USB Card Reader + Memory Card Wallet + Shock Proof Deluxe Case + Full Size Tripod + Accessory Saver Bundle!
